properties.name: config-manager.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable config-manager auto configurations.

properties.name: config-manager.source
properties.description: Use one of 'jdbc', 'mongo', 'cassandra', or 'properties' values.

properties.name: config-manager.jdbc.driver-class-name
properties.description: Write JDBC driver class name.

properties.name: config-manager.jdbc.url
properties.description: Enter JDBC URL.

properties.name: config-manager.jdbc.username
properties.description: Enter JDBC Username.

properties.name: config-manager.jdbc.password
properties.description: Enter JDBC Password.

properties.name: config-manager.jdbc.select-sql
properties.description: Enter select SQL. For example: SELECT SETTING_NAME, SETTING_VALUE FROM APP_SETTINGS.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.servers
properties.description: Set host and port information of the server.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.ssl-enabled
properties.description: Enable SSL encryption in communication with mongodb.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.db-name
properties.description: Set name of the mongoDB database which holds the configuration.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.collection
properties.description: Set name of the mongoDB collection which holds the configuration.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.key-field-name
properties.description: Set name of the field which holds the key for the configuration.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.value-field-name
properties.description: Set name of the field which holds the value for the configuration.

properties.name: config-manager.mongo.query
properties.description: Set the search conditions that will bring the configuration.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.nodes
properties.description: Set host and port fields of Cassandra Cluster which are required to connect.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.select-sql
properties.description: Set sql “select” statement to create template queries or commands.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.username
properties.description: Set username to be used while connecting to cassandra.

properties.name: config-manager.cassandra.password
properties.description: Set password to be used while connecting to cassandra.

properties.name: config-manager.properties.property-files
properties.description: List of strings which are the paths of property files. Examples: classpath:settings.properties, file:///home/username/settings.properties.

properties.name: config-manager.reload.enabled
properties.description: Set true if you need reloading properties automatically.

properties.name: config-manager.reload.trigger
properties.description: Set one of `cron` or `periodical` values.

properties.name: config-manager.reload.cron-expression
properties.description: Set cron expression to trigger reload.

properties.name: config-manager.reload.period
properties.description: Set reload period.

properties.name: config-manager.reload.period-unit
properties.description: Set reload period unit.

properties.name: config-manager.encryption.enabled
properties.description: Enable encryption for configuration values.

properties.name: config-manager.encryption.secret-key
properties.description: Set secret key for encryption.

values.description: Uses specified property files as property sources.
Uses cron expression as trigger to reload properties.
Uses fixed period as trigger to reload properties.
